sentences.english: The BLOs provide short-term shelter and can provide medical care.

sentences.english: In technical side, short and mid-term technical indicators keep on rise.
sentences.chinese: 技术面，短期及中期各项技术指标保持多头强势状态。

sentences.english: We believe that the sea is the production of "Tamiflu" short-term performance thickening.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为，海正生产“达菲”短期增厚业绩。

sentences.english: The previously known most distant object was a short-lived gamma ray burst.
sentences.chinese: 之前所知最遥远的天体是一次短期的伽玛射线暴。

sentences.english: Decreased overall still in channels, short-short pattern is unchanged.
sentences.chinese: 总体仍处于下跌通道中，短期空头格局不变。

sentences.english: Disaster situation, the sea shortly world Street bars unable to operate normally.

sentences.english: Some cadres are eager to be in short-term gain perhaps gives inside lieutenancy .
sentences.chinese: 有的干部急于在短期或者是任期内出成果。

sentences.english: Think short term and long term.
sentences.chinese: 同时制定好短期计划和长期计划。

sentences.english: The so-called "green barriers" cannot be completely eliminated in a short term.
sentences.chinese: 所谓的“绿色壁垒”短期内没可能完全消除。

sentences.english: So there is the short-term issue of how to tighten policy safely.
sentences.chinese: 所以短期问题是如何安全缩紧政策。

sentences.english: In other words, long-dated bonds offer a lot more income than short ones.
sentences.chinese: 换句话说，长期债券的收益要高于短期债券。

sentences.english: In the short-run, there are definitely some headwinds.
sentences.chinese: 短期而言，金价上涨无疑存在一些阻力。

sentences.english: Therefore, the accurate assessment of the credit risk of STCP is on imminent.
sentences.chinese: 所以，对短期融资券信用风险的准确评估就迫在眉睫。

sentences.english: A business overdraft would be most suitable for short-term loans.
sentences.chinese: 商业透支项目最适合短期贷款。

sentences.english: Some of the effects of short-term sleep deprivation can be very similar to the effects of being drunk.
sentences.chinese: 短期睡眠剥夺的某些影响与醉酒的后果类似。

sentences.english: Set specific short- and long-term goals.
sentences.chinese: 制定详细的短期和长期目标。
